subtitles.text: Kubo, the double center of the new song, quizzed Yamashita on his new song.
The quiz was again about the two center members, and the prize money was 1,000,000 yen.
The prize money was 1,000,000 yen if all the members answered correctly.
Tonight, the remaining 500,000 yen in prize money was up for grabs, so the fourth question was a no-brainer.
Tamura, come out! Tamura! Come on, Tamura!
We've known each other longer and longer, so I'm eager to guess.
I think it's safe to say that the longer you've known each other, the better off you'll be.
What will Shiori Kubo eat first?
I don't know, even if they've known each other for a long time.
There's a lot going on with Murasaki at Torikyu.
If you've known her long enough, you might be able to figure this one out.
I tried to speak without permission.
I'm sure you've all seen them on the set of a movie, right?
They're white, kind of like a deep-fried batter, and they're delicious, but I don't think I'll start with the main course.
But I don't think I'll start with the main dish.
I haven't used it once yet.
I haven't used it once yet.
We'll be lucky if we get a third-term student who's seen Kubo eat this.
I'd like to see a third-term student.
You've got a chance to make up for what you just said.
After hearing Yoda's answer, Tamura didn't have to make an example out of it.
I was thinking, please don't answer that.
I don't know if Kubo's eating it, or if he's seen it, or if they're standing side by side together.
I'm not looking at anyone's lunch.
You don't talk about that kind of thing?
He's got a "kamaboko" kind of vibe.
I was wondering about the fish paste too.
I think she might eat rice and salad, too.
Many of the other members are nodding their heads in agreement.
That's the image I have, isn't it?
You want to get on the fish cake?
It's true that if you get involved with Nayoda Ganbare, you'll suddenly feel like you're going down from a million yen.
All right, then, correct or incorrect, Mr. Himura?
The correct answer is that it's rice.
And I was eating Kizan's lunch with rice before the recording started today!
No matter what kind of bento it is, I always start with rice!
I always start with rice, no matter what kind of bento it is.
But you all switched to 250,000 yen.
That's a lot of money... if you think about it.
Suddenly the guy in front of me said he'd give it to me.
I'd be happy to give you 250,000 yen.
The next person to try to keep the 250,000 yen is Ichinose.
If Mizuki Yamashita had this nowWhat does Mizuki Yamashita say he would eat twice as much rice if he had this now?
I wonder what he meant when he said he could eat as many times as he wanted.
Before the four choices were made, Ichinose seemed to have figured something out.
What do you know about her liking garlic?
If I miss this one, it's 100,000 yen.
Ichinose, could you whisper so I can't hear?
What kind of hints are you trying to give me?
Like the way you look when you eat.
I don't know... I'm afraid it'll get mixed up.
Okay, okay... the expression you make when you eat is okay.
Come on, Ichinose, make up your mind.
I love to eat bubers with butter and messy food.
I love to eat bubblers with butter.
You seem to know what I'm talking about.
You like things that make people go, "What's this?" And you have a sense of immorality.
Next, Captain Umezawa takes on the 100,000 yen question!
If I can't answer, no one can.
But the question is no longer about what you said in the past.
That's a bit of a problem.
In terms of digging into the Love Center...
We don't need that, do we?
You want to copy them, don't you?
Fans are hungry for that kind of thing.
Butter may be gone from Tokyo.
What is the past that Shiori Kubo wants to erase in the events of this program?
In the Grand Prix 2019, you know, the one you're going to win.
During the quiz, a song from the defense was suddenly asked.
In the vertical division class competition project of 2021
I wrote my name and asked who had the most god-like hair.
I wrote my name and got the red end of the stick.
The mask I received was too similar to the one I wore and it became a drama.
This is the Valentine's Day project 2018.
I've been saying "I love you" and "I adore you" to many people.
I've become a "beauty on all sides" character for a while.
I'm sure you're recovering from the first one.
I think it was answered in your recent intro.
I'm sure there was... that's what you meant when you said you'd answered the defense.
I'll replace it with "if I were you" once.
Then please answer for Masaaki Korina.
The second case, the Kami Sarasara case.
This is... you wrote your name as "Goddess Sarasara.
I know... ever since then, when I hear "kami sara-sara" from my juniors, I think they're all messing with me.
You've been with Ume this whole time.
I'm embarrassed that I said that.
But you've become a legend like this.
Will we keep the 100,000 yen? Next, we have Matsuo.
If Mizuki Yamashita and Shiori Kubo had an arm wrestling match, who would win?
I'll ask you to write the name of the winner on the board.
If he's too muscular, let's stop.
First of all, we bow to each other.
I wonder if this is a descendant of Chuck's.
I think I've got a good grip.
YamashitaYes, you've been working on it right from the start.
You think it'll work?Do you think you can do it?
That's why I want to win.
On the contrary, I want to win.
Oh, I'm surprised which one is...
You know, at first we were both pretty hard on each other.
I'm so happy to see your muscles.
I'm actually not good at arm wrestling.
I have no pressure or strength.
I wonder which one did Atsuo write?
Kubo, you like baseball. I thought you move your arm a lot.
I thought he'd have more power... than Yamashita.
50,000 yen I want to keep somehow The next challenger is Yumiki
This question was taken from an unpublished survey by Kubo at the Otatashi no Ojisan no Aru Aru Study Session
This question is from an unpublished survey by Kubo.

What did you mistake for the famous words of the patrolling scene?
I'll tell you about the planting scene.
Detective G-Pants, when he corners the criminal, the criminal gets scared and shoots him.
He shoots himself in the stomach.
I was hoping you could answer that question.
I'm already up to the first word, so maybe it'll work.

Can I draw a chance card?
What is this? What is this?

But I don't think I'll be able to hear it like this.
I'll give you a hint... at least this one.
Let me give you the first letter.
Then please give me the answer.
How about the letters for the head and the ass for the chest, Mr. Himura?
What do you think, Mr. Himura?
He's just saying the answer, but he can't really be saying the answer, can he?
I said "Moo said the answer" and it turned into "breast".
How can he be a mune?
We were saying that the answer is a bit crazy, but it's hard, isn't it?
If you get two more questions wrong, you'll be forced to quit.
This question was taken from Yamashita's unpublished survey from the April Fool's Battle in 2018.
Oh yeah, I forgot to tell you recently.

I put on a pair of socks that I had hung out to dry and found a honyara inside.

I don't know... money.Well, what should I do?

I found some coins in it.
It's the difference between bills and coins.
What do you think, Mr. Nimura?
What do you think, Mr. Himura?
I was lost for two days.
I don't want to say what?
I'm more curious about the money.
It's not like it's on your Christmas pillow.
The point is, it's a bug.

Did you remember this, Mr. Yamashita?
I put them on and saw a grasshopper?
In the survey for the Fukuoka Story Grand Prix

I don't know which is which.

If it looks like a black body, it's a praying mantis.

If it looked black, it's a mantis.
If it looks black, it's a praying mantis.
I'm in first place. I'm in the survey.
If I make a mistake next time...
If you make a mistake here, you get zero prize money!
What kind of monoboke will she make with these goods?

I'll do the one I saw. Please forgive me.

How can we give him a clue when we're the ones doing it now?

You were supposed to show us this.

It's not going to hit me.

You're not going to get it!
